channel.title: Harkness Roses
channel.description: Bush and Climbing | Potted and Bare Root | Mail Order

item.title: Rose Golden 50th Wedding Anniver. 4L pot
item.description: A perfect gift to celebrate any couple reaching their momentous Golden Wedding Anniversary, marking 50 years of marriage. This spectacular rose offers great pleasure for many years to come.Beautiful and rounded, deep golden-yellow blooms burst from dark and glossy green foliage across the warm months of summer, even into the first weeks of autumn.What's more, each bloom produces a lovely sweet scent which delights the senses without overwhelming other natural perfumes.'Golden Wedding' boasts a healthy and strong growth habit, and is repeat-flowering for prolonged garden interest. The perfect present for someone special, it will brighten up their garden for years and constantly remind them of their special day, each time the blooms emerge.Supplied freshly in a 4 litre pot, ready to be planted out.We always endeavour to provide beautifully formed plants; however, our roses will naturally start to lose their leaves from October to prepare for the colder months. Do not worry though, as they will flourish once again with leaves and buds in the spring. Please, make sure you consider the season when purchasing our remarkable roses for yourself or loved ones.
item.g:product_type: Shop > Gift Roses and Plants > Anniversary Rose
item.g:google_product_category: Home and Garden > Plants > Indoor and Outdoor Plants > Landscaping and Garden Plants

item.title: Rose Ruby 40th Wedding Anniver. 4L pot
item.description: Make a landmark wedding anniversary even more special with this remarkable picture-perfect rose with ruby red petals.The 'Ruby 40th Wedding Anniversary' rose bursts to life with masses of vibrant blooms from early summer, before repeatedly flowering into autumn.The exceptional red flowerheads stand out remarkably as they contrast against the thick foliage of glossy and deep green leaves. A real statement of a bush rose, the aromatic blooms are sure to leave the happy couple reminiscing about their special day each time they smell the delight, for years to come.A versatile rose that looks right at home in a bed or mixed border, or as a potted plant for the patio.Supplied freshly in a 4 litre pot, ready to be planted out.We always endeavour to provide beautifully formed plants; however, our roses will naturally start to lose their leaves from October to prepare for the colder months. Do not worry though, as they will flourish once again with leaves and buds in the spring. Please, make sure you consider the season when purchasing our remarkable roses for yourself or loved ones.
item.g:product_type: Shop > Gift Roses and Plants > Anniversary Rose
item.g:google_product_category: Home and Garden > Plants > Indoor and Outdoor Plants > Landscaping and Garden Plants

item.title: Rose China Wedding 20th Anniver. 4L pot
item.description: China Wedding 20th Anniversary is a wonderful Hybrid Tea rose that makes a perfect gift for a special couple in your life celebrating the momentous landmark. Despite the delicate appearance, the petals resist damage from wet and rain very well. There is a pleasing fruity perfume.One of the strongest features is the excellent disease resistance from the leathery foliage.Supplied freshly in a 4 litre pot, ready to be planted out.We always endeavour to provide beautifully formed plants; however, our roses will naturally start to lose their leaves from October to prepare for the colder months. Do not worry though, as they will flourish once again with leaves and buds in the spring. Please, make sure you consider the season when purchasing our remarkable roses for yourself or loved ones.
